xt:description.p: The Dartmouth College Library's local implementation of MODS, the Metadata Object Description Schema.

ul.li: Timestamp algorithm changed in crossref.xsl to produce consistently sortable output. [issue #1]
New MODS transformation scenario, "MODS Combination", defined to batch up records in separate files into a single file within the mods:modsCollection container element.
"MODS-to-MARCXML" transformation now gives user option to copy local record identifier to 001 and 003 fields.
Update Dissertation and Winter Carnival Poster templates.
